action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shambling horror makes a number of Swipe attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down) (minimum 1).

action.name: Swipe
entries: Natural Weapon: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d12} + Spell Level) bludgeoning damage.
A Shambling Horror is a minion created using {@spell Animate Shambling Horror|GWN}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The jagged horror makes a number of Spike attacks equal to half the level of the spell minus 1 (rounded down, subtraction first) (minimum 1).

action.name: Spike
entries: Natural Weapon: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d4 + 3} + Spell Level) piercing damage; the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or start {@condition bleeding|GW} for 1 minute, taking damage equal to a number of {@dice d6} equal to the Spell Level minus 1.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
A Jagged Horror is made upon death of a {@creature Shambling Horror|GWN}, any minion who dies under the effects of the enchantment {@spell Jagged Bones|GWN} or both.
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10...12 spirit. This spirit's attacks deal 5...25...30 damage. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Spirit of Anguish makes a number of Anguish attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down, minimum 1).

action.name: Anguish
entries: {@atk rs} your spell attack modifier to hit, range 90/120 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 2d6 + Spell Level}) psychic damage; if the target was suffering from a harmful {@status Concentration|XPHB} spell, the attack deals double damage.
Empowerment
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...11...14 spirit. All allies within its range holding an item gain 15...39...45 maximum Health and 10 maximum Energy. This spirit dies after 15...51...60 seconds.

trait.name: Empowerment
entries: Any friendly, non-summoning ritual creature that is holding an object created by a spell has their hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 10 × Spell Level and gains a temporary spell slot equal to half the level of the spell (minimum 1).
Gaze of Fury
Binding Ritual. Destroy target spirit and create a level 1...11...14 Spirit of Fury. This spirit's attacks deal 5...17...20 damage. This spirit dies after 30...54...60 seconds.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Spirit of Fury makes a number of Fury attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down, minimum 1).

action.name: Fury
entries: {@atk rs} your spell attack modifier to hit, range 90/120 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 3d6 + Spell Level}) fire damage.

spell.name: Overbearing Smash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Exploit a creature's momentary vulnerability if they are prone to daze them.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d12} damage, and, if the target is knocked {@condition prone}, must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition dazed|GW} for the duration. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Overbearing Smash
Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +1...16...20 damage. If target foe is knocked down, that foe is Dazed for 1...7...8 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d12} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Magehunter's Smash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 8, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Unblockable|GW}, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Attempt to knock a creature {@condition prone}; creatures with a beneficial effect on them have a harder time resisting.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d12} damage, and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
If the target is under the effect of a beneficial spell, the target has disadvantage on the saving throw, and this attack gains the {@variantrule Unblockable|GW} property.
Magehunter's Smash
Elite Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, target foe is knocked down. If your target is under the effects of an enchantment, this attack cannot be blocked.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d12} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Spear of Lightning

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the thrown property

entries: {@variantrule Armor Penetration|GW}, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Sheathe your weapon in lightning, penetrating your enemies defenses.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d12} lightning damage.
Spear of Lightning
Spear Attack. If this attack hits, it deals +8...18...20 lightning damage. This attack has 25% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Slayer's Spear

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the thrown property

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Empower your spear to fell great enemies, inflicting a {@condition deep wound|GW} to a creature with more health than you.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d8} damage, and if you have fewer hit points than the target, must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GW} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Slayer's Spear
Spear Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...21...25 damage. If that foe has more Health than you, that foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Lion's Comfort
entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 4
Take comfort in the healing embrace of the Elonian sun, just like a prairie lion.
You cannot use your signets, or {@spell Lion's Comfort|GW}, for the duration.
You regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + spellcasting ability modifier, and you gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of Adrenaline.
Lion's Comfort
Skill. All of your signets are disabled for 12 seconds. You are healed for 50...98...110 Health, and gain 0...2...3 strike[s] of adrenaline.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st, the adrenaline gain increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st and the duration increases by 2 rounds for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: "Lead the Way!"
entries: {@variantrule Chant|GW}
Shout “Lead the way,” encouraging a party member to blaze the way forward.
Choose one friendly creature that can hear you within range. For the duration, the target's speed is increased by 25%.
The duration increases by 1 round for each ally within range.
"Lead the Way!"
Shout. Target ally moves 25% faster for 1...4...5 seconds for each ally within earshot (maximum of 20 seconds).

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration for each ally increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: "The Power Is Yours!"
entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 4, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Shout|GW}
Motivate your allies to act more quickly, increasing their initiative.
Choose any number of friendly creatures that can hear you within range. For the duration, at the start of each target's turns, a target's initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4}.
"The Power Is Yours!"
Elite Shout. For 3 seconds, all allies within earshot gain 0...1...1 Energy regeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Mystic Regeneration
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Create a magical connection to the rejuvenating properties of the earth to heal yourself for each spell on you every turn.
For the duration, at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} per beneficial spell on you.
Mystic Regeneration
Enchantment Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, you have +1...3...4 Health regeneration for each enchantment (maximum of 8) on you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the final healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Victorious Sweep

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Gloat in your victory over a creature, gaining health if you have more health than them.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d10} damage, and if you have more hit points than the target, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d6}.
Victorious Sweep
Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...21...25 damage. If target foe has less Health than you, you gain 30...70...80 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d10} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit, and the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Disrupting Throw

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: Quickly throw a spear, disrupting a creature suffering from at least one condition.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee or ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and, if the target is suffering from a condition, must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
Disrupting Throw
Spear Attack. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a condition, that foe is interrupted.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the thrown property

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: "Fall Back!"
entries: {@variantrule Shout|GW}
Command your allies to “Fall Back!” increasing their movement speed and healing them if they move.

Choose any number of friendly creatures that can hear you within range. For the duration, a target's speed is increased by 33%, and if a target takes the dash action or moves at least 30 feet while affected by this spell, they regain Hit Points equal to {@dice 2d4}.
When a target makes an attack roll, this spell ends on that target.
"Fall Back!"

Shout. For 4...9...10 seconds, all allies within earshot gain 5...13...15 Health per second while moving and move 33% faster. "Fall Back!" ends on an ally affected by this shout when that ally successfully hits with an attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st and the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Heart of Fury
entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 4, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Wreath your heart in divine fury, increasing your attack speed.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn.
Heart of Fury
Stance. For 2...8...10 seconds, you attack 25% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Guiding Hands
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}, {@variantrule Unblockable|GW}
Let the wind guide your hands to strike true.
End the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition on yourself.
For the duration, your next three attacks have the {@variantrule Unblockable|GW} property.
Guiding Hands
Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, your next 0...2...3 attack[s] cannot be blocked. When activated, this skill removes the Blindness condition.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks this spell effects increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Assassin's Remedy
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Apply Assassin's Remedy to yourself, which cleanses the body through exertion.
For the duration, your next {@dice 1d4} {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW|Weapon Attack Spells} also end the latest harmful condition on you before the attack roll.
Assassin's Remedy
Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, the next 1...8...10 attack skills you use remove one condition.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by {@dice 1d2} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Augury of Death
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Foretell a creature's demise and implant a magical trigger in them to help it along.
Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. If the target becomes {@status Bloodied|XPHB}, this spell ends, and you gain the following benefits:
- You learn the location of where the creature is.
- If that location is on the same plane of existence, you can use your reaction to teleport within 5 feet of the target.
- The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains a {@condition Deep Wound|GW} for 1 minute.
Augury of Death

Hex Spell. For 5...29...35 seconds, the next time damage would drop target foe's Health below 50%, you inflict a Deep Wound for 5...17...20 seconds and Shadow Step to that foe. This spell has half the normal range.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: The duration increases with a spell slot of level 3 (3 days), 4 (10 days), 5 (30 days), 6 (50 days), 7 (100 days), 8 (150 days), and 9 (366 days).

spell.name: Attacker's Insight
entries: {@variantrule Flash Enchantment|GWN}
Use the wind flows of your enemies to gain an insight into their attack pattern, weakening them if the spell ends.
For the duration, when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you have a +5 bonus to AC against attacks made by that creature until the end of your next turn.

When this spell ends, target each hostile creature within a 10-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition weakness|GW|weakened} for the duration. On a successful save, a target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Attacker's Insight
Flash Enchantment Spell. For 3...9...10 seconds you have a 50% chance to block while attacking. When this enchantment ends, you inflict Weakness on all adjacent foes for 3...13...15 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Aura of Thorns
entries: {@variantrule Flash Enchantment|GWN}
Conjure an aura of thorns around {@condition bleeding|GW} creatures close to you, and when the spell ends, detonate it to inflict cripple.

Target each hostile creature within a 10-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target starts {@condition bleeding|GW} for the duration, taking {@damage 3d6} damage. On a successful save, a target is affected for 1 round only.

When this spell ends, target each hostile creature within a 10-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition crippled|GW} for the duration. On a successful save, a target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Aura of Thorns

Flash Enchantment Spell. All nearby foes begin Bleeding for 5...13...15 seconds. For 30 seconds, this enchantment does nothing. When this enchantment ends, all nearby foes are Crippled for 3...7...8 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Chilling Victory

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 6, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Use the proximity to death of a creature to create an icy explosion around them.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d10} damage, and if you have more hit points than the target, each hostile creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} cold damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Chilling Victory
Scythe Attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +3...13...15 damage. For each foe hit who has less Health than you, that foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 10...26...30 cold damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d10} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit, and the cold damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: "There's Nothing to Fear!"
entries: {@variantrule Shout|GW}
Support your allies through encouragement.

Choose any number of creatures that can hear you within range. For the duration, a target is immune to the {@condition frightened} condition, and when a target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
When this spell ends, a target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability.
"There's Nothing to Fear!"

Shout. For 4 seconds and 1 second for every 2 ranks in Leadership, all party members within earshot take 20...35% less damage. Affected party members are healed for 35...60 Health when this shout ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ebon Hawk
entries: Send out a hawk made of stone.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d10} force damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition weakness|GW|weakened} for the duration. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Ebon Hawk
Spell. Send a projectile that strikes target foe for 10...70...85 earth damage and causes Weakness for 5...13...15 seconds if it hits.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Cry of Pain

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: Make a creature involuntarily release a cry of pain, disrupting them and harming their allies.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range. The creature makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the spell/ability dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

If the target was under the effect of a harmful Mesmer-themed spell, target each hostile creature in a 20-foot Emanation centered on the target. Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} psychic damage, and for 3 rounds at the start of each of a target's turns, a target takes {@damage 2d6} psychic damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and is affected for 1 round only.
Cry of Pain
Spell. Interrupt target foe's skill. If that foe was suffering from a Mesmer hex, that foe and all foes in the area take 25...50 damage and have 3...5 Health degeneration for 10 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Pensive Guardian
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Place a pensive guardian on a creature that defends them against advantaged opponents.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target has a +5 bonus to AC against attacks from creatures under the effect of a beneficial spell.
Pensive Guardian
Enchantment Spell. For 5...10...11 seconds, target ally has a 50% chance to block attacks from enchanted foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Animate Shambling Horror
entries: Exploit a nearby corpse to create a {@creature Shambling Horror|GWN}, which turns into a {@creature Jagged Horror|GWN} when it dies.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, and the target becomes a {@creature Shambling Horror|GWN}.

The {@creature Shambling Horror|GWN} remains for the duration or until it reaches zero hit points, at which point it will turn into a {@creature Jagged Horror|GWN}. The {@creature Jagged Horror|GWN} remains for 1 minute or until it reaches zero hit points, at which point it will turn into ash.

The {@creature Shambling Horror|GWN} and {@creature Jagged Horror|GWN} are friendly to you and your allies for the duration. If you fall {@condition unconscious}, the {@creature Shambling Horror|GWN} and {@creature Jagged Horror|GWN} become hostile towards everything instead of disintegrating into ash. The {@creature Shambling Horror|GWN} and {@creature Jagged Horror|GWN} act on your initiative but take their turn directly after yours. The {@creature Shambling Horror|GWN} and {@creature Jagged Horror|GWN} are in the DM's control.
On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to animate another {@creature Shambling Horror|GWN} this way.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
Animate Shambling Horror

Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a level 1...14...17 shambling horror. When the shambling horror dies, it is replaced by a level 0...12...15 jagged horror that causes Bleeding with each of its attacks.

spell.name: Crossfire

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Use the distraction of an ally to slip past an enemy's defenses.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d8} damage. If the target is within 15 feet of an ally of yours, the attack gains the {@variantrule Unblockable|GW} property.
Crossfire
Bow Attack. If this attack hits target foe, it deals +5...17...20 damage. If that foe is near any of your allies, this attack cannot be blocked.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Reversal of Damage

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range take damage

entries: Twist the fate around one creature, reflecting some of the impact back on an attacker.
Roll {@dice 1d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage, and the creature that dealt the damage takes radiant damage equal to the number rolled.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Reversal of Damage
Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally would take damage, the foe dealing the damage takes that damage instead (maximum 5...61...75).

spell.name: "They're on Fire!"
entries: {@variantrule Shout|GW}
Lessen the impact of {@condition burning|GW} foes.

Choose any number of creatures that can hear you within range. For the duration, when a target takes damage from a creature that is {@condition burning|GW}, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
"They're on Fire!"
Shout. For 10 seconds, party members within earshot take 5...29...35% less damage from foes suffering from Burning.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Anthem of Flame
entries: {@variantrule Chant|GWN}
Wreathe your allies weapons in flame with an anthem of flame.

Choose any number of creatures that can hear you within range. For the duration, the next time a target hits with a weapon attack, the target of the attack starts {@condition burning|GW} for 3 rounds, taking {@damage 1d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Anthem of Flame
Chant. For 10 seconds, the next attack skill used by each party member within earshot also causes Burning for 1...3...3 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration of the {@condition burning|GW} condition increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Anguish
entries: {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Anguish|GWN}
Bind a Spirit of Anguish to your will, dealing damage with its attacks that impact harder against already suffering creatures.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Anguish|GWN} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative but takes its turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DM's control.
Anguish
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...9...11 spirit. This spirit's attacks deal 5...17...20 damage and deal double damage to hexed foes. This spirit dies after 15...39...45 seconds.

spell.name: Death Pact Signet
entries: {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Long Rest
Activate your Death Pact Signet, binding your life force to a dead creature to reanimate it.

Choose one friendly creature, which has not been dead for more than 1 minute, that you can see within range. The target returns to life with hit points equal to up to your current hit points. For the next hour, if the target dies, you also die.
Death Pact Signet
Signet. Resurrect target party member with your current Health and 15...83...100% Energy. The next time that ally dies within 120 seconds, so do you.

spell.name: Eternal Aura
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW|Enchantment:} You cannot choose to end {@status Concentration|XPHB} on this spell.
Cover yourself in an aura of eternity.
For the duration, your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 100.

When this spell ends, choose any number of friendly creatures that have not been dead for more than 1 year that you can see within a 20-foot Emanation (this can include yourself if your {@status Concentration|XPHB} broke because you died). A target returns to life with 25% of their maximum hit points. On a target's next turn, a target can use either an action or a bonus action, not both.
This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
Eternal Aura
Enchantment Spell. You have +100 max Health. When this enchantment ends, all party members in the area are resurrected with 40...50% Health and 20...30% Energy.

m.text: gems worth 5000+ GP, which the spell consumes

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 10th level or higher, your hit points increase by an additional 25 for each slot level above 9th, and the % increases by 25% for each slot level above 9th.

spell.name: Eremite's Attack

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Rip a spell from yourself to perform a devastating sweep.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d10} damage, and then, if possible, remove the latest beneficial {@status Concentration|XPHB} spell on yourself. If a spell was removed, target each hostile creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d10} damage.
Eremite's Attack
Scythe Attack. If it hits, this attack deals +1...8...10 damage and removes a Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment is removed, you do an additional +1...8...10 damage and strike all adjacent foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, a target also takes {@damage 1d10} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Enchanted Haste
entries: {@variantrule Flash Enchantment|GWN}
Quickly dash to a new location.
For the duration, your speed is increased by 25%.
When this spell ends prematurely, remove the latest harmful condition from yourself.
Enchanted Haste
Flash Enchantment Spell. For 7 seconds, you move 25% faster. If this enchantment ends prematurely, you lose 1 condition.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the % increases by 25% for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Crippling Sweep

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Slice a creature's tendons to cripple them.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d10} damage, and is {@condition crippled|GW} for 1 round. If the attack was an opportunity attack, the target takes an additional {@damage 1d10} damage.
Crippling Sweep
Scythe Attack. If this attack hits a foe, that foe is Crippled for 3...10...12 seconds. This skill deals +3...13...15 extra damage if that foe is moving.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d10} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Barbed Spear

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the thrown property

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 2, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Conjure hooks on your weapon that inflict {@condition bleeding|GW}.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and starts {@condition bleeding|GW}, taking {@damage 1d6} damage for 1 minute.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Barbed Spear
Spear Attack. If this attack hits, your target begins Bleeding for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Aria of Restoration
entries: {@variantrule Chant|GWN}
Perform an aria of restoration, which mends allies wounds by using excess spell energy.

Choose any number of creatures that can hear you within range. For the duration, the next time a target casts a spell, they regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d8} + their spellcasting ability modifier.
Aria of Restoration
Chant. For 10 seconds, the next time each party member within earshot uses a spell, that party member gains 30...78...90 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Aria of Zeal
entries: {@variantrule Chant|GWN}
Perform an aria of zeal that uses arcane residue to motivate creatures to act.
Choose any number of creatures that can hear you within range. For the duration, the next time a target casts a spell, their initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d8}.
Aria of Zeal
Chant. For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot uses a Spell, that ally gains 1...5...6 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the increase in initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Awe
entries: Force a creature to be in awe of you, disrupting their ability to cast spells.
Choose on {@condition prone} creature within range. The target is {@condition dazed|GW} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Awe
Skill. If this skill hits a knocked-down foe, that foe becomes Dazed for 5...13...15 seconds. Awe has half the normal range.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Black Spider Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light property

entries: {@variantrule Off-Hand Attack|GWF}, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Exploit a {@condition weakness|GW} in a hexed creature.

On a hit, if the target is suffering from a harmful spell, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 8d4} damage and is {@condition corruption|GW|corrupted}, taking {@damage 2d8} damage.
Black Spider Strike
Off-Hand Attack. Must strike a hexed foe. If it hits, this attack strikes for +5...17...20 damage and target foe is Poisoned for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 2d4} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Critical Agility
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Gain supernatural speed, fueled by critical strikes.

For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn, and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. When you score a critical hit, the duration of this spell resets.
Critical Agility
Enchantment Spell. For 4 seconds and 1 second for each rank of Critical Strikes, you attack 33% faster and gain 15...25 armor. This skill reapplies itself every time you land a critical hit.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Grenth's Fingers
entries: {@variantrule Flash Enchantment|GWN}
Enclose yourself in Grenth's icy embrace.

Target each hostile creature within a 10-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d8} cold damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
For the duration, your weapon attacks deal cold damage.

When this spell ends, target each hostile creature within a 10-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, each target gains a copy of the latest {@dice 1d2} harmful conditions on yourself. On a successful save, a target gains a copy with its duration reduced to 1 round. End all copied conditions on yourself.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Grenth's Fingers

Flash Enchantment Spell. All nearby foes are struck for 10...34...40 cold damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal cold damage. When this enchantment ends, you transfer  1...2...2 condition[s] to all nearby foes. [sic]

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, copy {@dice 1d2} additional conditions for each slot level above 2nd, and the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Harrier's Haste
entries: {@variantrule Flash Enchantment|GWN}
Invoke the speed and tenacity of a hunting hound.
For the duration, your speed is increased by 25%, and when you deal damage to a target that willingly moved on its last turn, you deal an additional {@damage 1d4} damage.
Harrier's Haste
Flash Enchantment Spell. For 2...7...8 seconds, you move 25% faster and deal +3...10...12 more damage against moving foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st, and the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Hexbreaker Aria
entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 8, {@variantrule Chant|GWN}
Perform a hexbreaker aria.
Choose any number of creatures that can hear you within range. For the duration, the next time a target casts a spell, the latest harmful spell of level 2 or lower on the target ends.
Hexbreaker Aria
Chant. For 10 seconds, the next time each ally within earshot casts a spell, that ally loses 1 hex.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Enduring Harmony
entries: {@variantrule Echo|GWN}
Give shouts and chants more staying power on a creature.
Choose one creature that can hear you within range. For the duration, the duration of {@variantrule Shout|GW} and {@variantrule Chant|GWN} spells is increased by 50%.
Enduring Harmony
Echo. For 10...30...35 seconds, chants and shouts last 50% longer on target non-spirit ally.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the % increases by 50% for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Empowerment
entries: {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Empowerment|GWN}
Bind a Spirit of Empowerment to your will, empowering your allies.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Empowerment|GWN} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative but takes its turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DM's control.
Empowerment
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...11...14 spirit. All allies within its range holding an item gain 15...39...45 maximum Health and 10 maximum Energy. This spirit dies after 15...51...60 seconds.

spell.name: Gaze of Fury
entries: {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Fury|GWN}
Use the power of an existing spirit to call forth the spirit of fury.

Target one summoning ritual that you can see within range. The target dies. Summon a {@creature Spirit of Fury|GWN} for the duration at the location of the previous summoning ritual. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative but takes its turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DM's control.
Gaze of Fury
Binding Ritual. Destroy target spirit and create a level 1...11...14 Spirit of Fury. This spirit's attacks deal 5...17...20 damage. This spirit dies after 30...54...60 seconds.

spell.name: Glowing Gaze
entries: Send out a fiery eye beam.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage. If you hit a {@condition burning|GW} target, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting of the spell.
Glowing Gaze
Spell. Target foe takes 5...41...50 fire damage. If that foe is on Fire, [sic] you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Hypochondria
entries: Make a creature a condition magnet.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Target each creature other than the chosen target in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature transfers all harmful conditions on themselves to the chosen target. On a successful save, a target transfers all harmful conditions with its duration reduced to 1 round.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Hypochondria
Spell. Transfer all conditions from all foes in the area to target foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Seed of Life
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Plant a seed of life into a creature that heals every time its host takes damage.

Choose one friendly creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. For the duration when the target takes damage from a non-friendly source, target each friendly creature in a 150-foot Emanation centered on the target. Each new target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier .
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Seed of Life
Enchantment Spell. For 2...5 seconds, whenever target other ally takes damage, all party members are healed for 2 Health for each rank in Divine Favor.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Feast for the Dead
entries: Suck out the life force of an undead minion you control to heal your other minions.

Choose one friendly undead creature, which has been created by a spell or an ability, that you can see within range. The target dies, and all other friendly undead creatures that have been created by a spell or an ability within range regain hit points equal to {@dice 8d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
This spell's healing increases by {@dice 4d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 12d4}), 11th level ({@dice 16d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 20d4}).
Feast for the Dead
Spell. Destroy target animated undead ally. All of your other animated undead allies are healed for 10...82...100 Health.

spell.name: Disrupting Accuracy
entries: {@variantrule Preparation|GW}
Enhance your accuracy supernaturally, disrupting creatures you critically hit.
For the duration, when you score a critical hit with a ranged weapon attack against a target, you {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB|incapacitate} the target until the start of your next turn.

components.m: a paper circle with a red dot in the middle

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number you need to roll to score a critical hit with a ranged weapon attack gets reduced by 1 for every two spell slot levels above 2nd.
Disrupting Accuracy
Preparation. For 36 seconds, whenever your arrows critical, they also interrupt your target.

spell.name: Sunspear Rebirth Signet
entries: {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Level Up
Channel the revitalizing power of the sunpears.

Choose one friendly creature, which has not been dead for more than 2 rounds, that you can see within range. The target returns to life with 100% of their maximum hit points and gets teleported within 5 feet of you. On the target's next turn, the target can use either an action or a bonus action, not both.
This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
Sunspear Rebirth Signet

Signet. Resurrect target dead party member at your location with full Health and 10% Energy for each Sunspear rank you have attained. This signet can only be used once per mission unless recharged by a morale boost.

m.text: gems worth 450 gp, which the spell consumes

spell.name: Deadly Haste
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Speed up your spells by slipping past your foes defences.
For the duration, you can cast spells with a range of 30 feet or lower that take an action to cast as a bonus action.
Deadly Haste
Enchantment Spell. For 10...30...35 seconds, half-ranged spells cast 5...41...50% faster and recharge 5...41...50% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 1 hour. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 8 hours.

spell.name: Deadly Paradox
entries: {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Hamper your ability to attack, to focus on your assassin spells.

For the duration, casting assassin-themed spells with a spell slot does not prevent you from casting other assassin-themed spells with spell slots during the same turn, and you can cast assassin-themed spells that take an action to cast as a bonus action. Additionally, you cannot cast {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW|Weapon Attack Spells} for the duration.
Deadly Paradox
Stance. All of your attack skills are disabled for 10 seconds. For 5...13...15 seconds, your Assassin skills activate and recharge 33% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 1 hour. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 8 hours.

spell.name: Death's Retreat
entries: Quickly step into the shadow of the ethereal plane to teleport next to an ally and heal if you are weaker than them.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. Teleport within 5 feet of the target to an unoccupied space. If the target has more hit points than you do, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Death's Retreat
Spell. Shadow Step to target ally. If you have less Health than that ally, you gain 40...112...130 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Heart of Holy Flame
entries: {@variantrule Flash Enchantment|GWN}
Inflame your heart with the righteous flames of Balthazar.

Target each hostile creature within a 10-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
For the duration, your weapon attacks deal radiant damage.

When this spell ends, target each hostile creature within a 10-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, each target starts {@condition burning|GW} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 1d6} damage. On a successful save, a target only burns for 1 round.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Heart of Holy Flame

Flash Enchantment Spell. All nearby foes take 5...25...30 holy damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal holy damage. When this enchantment ends, all nearby foes are set on fire for 2...4...5 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} and {@dice 1d6}, respectively, for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Imbue Health
entries: Share your vitality with a creature.
Choose one friendly creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to 50% of your current hit points.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the % increases by 25% for each slot level above 3rd.
Imbue Health
Spell. Target other ally is healed for 5...41...50% of your current Health (maximum 300 Health).

spell.name: Intimidating Aura
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Radiate intimidating energy by increasing your physical toughness.

For the duration, your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by {@damage 3d10} + Constitution modifier, and when you take damage from a creature with fewer current hit points than you, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Intimidating Aura
Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, you have +40...88...100 max Health and take 1...8...10 less damage from foes with less Health than you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, your hit points increase by an additional {@dice 2d10} for each slot level above 2nd, and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Glyph of Restoration
entries: Inscribe the Glyph of Restoration on your arcane focus, restoring health on spell cast.

For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting modifier + {@dice 2d4} per spell slot level. After this spell triggers {@dice 1d2 + 1} times, this spell ends.
Glyph of Restoration
Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next 2 spells heal you for 30...90...105 Health, and you are healed for 150...350...400% of the Energy cost of each spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by {@dice 1d2} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Mistrust
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Make a creature mistrust its allies.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the next time the target casts a spell that targets an enemy of theirs, the spell fails and has no effect, and then each hostile creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on the target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} psychic damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Mistrust
Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next spell that target foe casts on one of your allies fails and deals 10...82...100 damage to that foe and all nearby foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Shield of Absorption
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Conjure a shield of absorption that absorbs an ever-increasing amount of damage.

For the duration, when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, for the duration, each time this spell triggers on a creature, increase the number of dice rolled by 1.
Shield of Absorption
Enchantment Spell. For 3...6...7 seconds, damage received by target ally is reduced by 5 each time that ally is hit while under the effects of this enchantment.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Necrosis
entries: Cause rapid necrosis by using an existing malediction.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. If the target is suffering from a harmful condition or is under the effect of a harmful spell, the target takes {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage.
Necrosis
Skill. If target foe is suffering from a condition or hex, that foe suffers 60...90 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Leader's Comfort
entries: Take comfort in the presence of your allies.
You regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier. For each friendly creature within 150 feet of you, you regain an additional {@dice 2d4} hit points.
Leader's Comfort
Skill. You gain 30...66...75 Health. For each ally within earshot, you also gain +10...18...20 Health (maximum 140 Health).

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing each increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Mending Refrain
entries: {@variantrule Echo|GWN}
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
When a {@variantrule Shout|GW} or {@variantrule Chant|GW} ends on the target, re-apply this spell to the target.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Mending Refrain
Echo. For 15 seconds, target non-spirit ally has +2...3...3 Health regeneration. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Merciless Spear

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the thrown property

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 6, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Mercilessly punish an already weak target.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, and if the target is below 50% of the maximum hit points, they gain a {@condition deep wound|GW} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Merciless Spear
Spear Attack. If this attack hits a foe with less than 50% Health, that foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Never Rampage Alone
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}
Form a primal bond between yourself and one companion.

Choose one companion within range. For the duration, you and the companion can attack one additional time when either of you takes the attack action on their turn, and at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 4d4} hit points.
If you drop to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Never Rampage Alone
Skill. For 18...25 seconds, you and your pet attack 25% faster and have 1...3 Health regeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Critical Chop

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Aim for the weak spot of a creature to disable them when hitting it.

The critical hit range of this attack is increased by 1. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d6} damage. On a critical hit, the target is also {@condition incapacitated} for 1 round.
Critical Chop
Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you inflict +5...17...20 damage. If this attack results in a critical hit, target foe is interrupted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, a target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

variantrule.name: Chant
entries: Chants always affect you and your allies within 150 feet.
Chants always have a trigger condition for their effect to occur.
Once a chant has triggered its specified number of times (usally 1) it ends immeaditaly.
The Vocal component of a chant spell is a chant or hymn, and must be loud enough to be heared by a target.

variantrule.name: Echo
entries: Almost all Echoes fall into one of two categories: Refrains and Finales.
Refrains have a medium duration an re-apply themselves with their full duration whenever a {@variantrule Shout|GW} or {@variantrule Chant|GWN} ends on the target.
Finales have a longer duration and have a one-time effect whenever a {@variantrule Shout|GW} or {@variantrule Chant|GWN} ends on the target.

variantrule.name: Flash Enchantment
entries: Flash Enchantment spells can be used once per turn at any point during your turn (no action required).
Other wise they behave like normal {@variantrule Enchantment|GW} spells except that you cannot choose to end concentration on them.

background.name: Chant
entries: See {@variantrule Chant|GWN}.

background.name: Command
entries: No inherent effect. Many Paragon skills, especially those that protect your allies or increase your tactical position on the battlefield, become more effective with higher Command.

background.name: Dervish
entries: Serving the gods as holy warriors, dervishes stand confidently in the whirlwind of conflict. Martial techniques perfected in the deserts of Elona allow a Dervish’s scythe to lash out quickly at multiple opponents, surrounding the holy warrior with a swath of destruction. Initiates often learn spells of self-protection, prayers that rush a combatant into battle, and invocations that empower attacks with elemental fury. Masters of the profession can assume the form of a god, enacting divine will with holy blessings. Keenly aware of the conditions of a fight, a Dervish can reap great benefits by using multiple Enchantments. Wandering the savannahs and deserts of Elona, the faithful Dervish chants prayers to the earth and wind... and the fury of the sandstorm answers in response.

background.name: The Desolation
entries: The Desolation is situated on the northwestern portion of Elona, connected to the Crystal Desert. It is one of the most hostile regions on Tyria due to its sulfurous sands. It is riddled with poisonous sulfur deserts and is home to many undead creatures and the great Junundu wurms. The land was once under the rule of Palawa Joko but following his imprisonment the undead armies have gone through schisms and formed smaller groups.

The Desolation was once the coast of the Crystal Sea, and described as being a 'valley of verdant growth.' It was here that Abaddon was cast down by the other gods and banished into the Realm of Torment. His fall shattered and poisoned the land, turning it into what it is now. As the place where he was cast down, the Desolation is the part of Tyria closest to the Realm of Torment and it has begun to leak through and twist the already damaged lands.

background.name: Earth Prayers
entries: No inherent effect. Many Dervish Spells, especially those dealing with defense or Earth damage, become more effective with higher Earth Prayers.

background.name: Echo
entries: See {@variantrule Echo|GWN}.

background.name: Flash Enchantment
entries: See {@variantrule Flash Enchantment|GWN}.

background.name: Istan
entries: The island province of Istan is known for its navy — a formidable fleet that patrols Elona's western coastline. Each day, ships from Tyria, Cantha, and other distant parts of the world arrive in the port city of Kamadan. From there, merchant ships travel to Istan's numerous islands and the Kournan mainland, braving waters troubled by corsair patrols, cyclones, and greater dangers. Valiant Istani watch the waters, confident that when hostile outsiders arrive in Elona, the province’s citizens, soldiers, and sailors will be ready for them.

Great Istani heroes have been forged by great adversity: war, famine, invasion, and stranger threats. Over six hundred years ago, the infamous Scarab Plague devastated this province. Victims died horribly, as insects erupted through boils on their skin. Many believed the outbreak of plague had supernatural origins, blaming the suffering of the innocent on unseen forces. In this troubled time, heroes tended to the sick, evacuated towns and villages, and searched for the source of corruption. Though the origin of the plague was never found, great tales are still told of heroes helping the beleaguered populace.

To this day, Istan rewards bravery and accomplishment. No word describes its government more than 'meritocracy': the best and brightest are rewarded with promotion, and years of service are recognized. Village elders watch over many towns and outposts, eventually rising to positions of respect and authority on the Council of Elders. The province has its fair share of miscreants and scoundrels, of course—criminals typically sink to the dregs of society—but each dawn in Istan, another hero’s journey begins.

background.name: Kourna
entries: The province of Kourna is eternally ready for war. Military historians analyze the great battles that have taken place here: the epic conflicts of Primeval Kings, the desperate efforts to unite the land in the Shattered Dynasty Era, and of course, Turai Ossa’s defeat of Palawa Joko near the Grand Cataract at Jahai. For centuries, Kourna has had a military government, and its leaders have been direct descendents of Warmarshal Turai Ossa. Inspired by his example, Kournans revere loyalty, patriotism, a strong sense of duty, and dedication to military service. Not every Kournan is a soldier, but farmers laboring in the fields and crafters slaving in workshops know the value of a safe and secure province. The strength of the state depends on loyalty to its leaders. Pacified Centaur laborers add to the province’s muscle. Typical Kournan dedication drives citizens to work hard for prosperity—in fact, the entire nation relies on the province’s agriculture and handiwork. Kournan adventurers go to war secure in the knowledge that their swords are well-tempered and their armor well-made, forged as surely as the soldiers who wield them.

background.name: Leadership
entries: You gain 2 Energy for each ally affected by one of your Shouts or Chants (maximum 1 Energy for every 2 ranks).

background.name: Motivation
entries: No inherent effect. Many Paragon skills, especially those related to Energy management or that inspire your allies, become more effective with higher Motivation.

background.name: Mysticism
entries: Each rank in Mysticism reduces the cost of your Dervish enchantments by 4%. In PvE, you have +1 armor per rank of Mysticism while you are enchanted.

background.name: No Attribute - Paragon
entries: No Attribute skills are those which are not tied to a particular attribute. Effects of these unlinked skills are almost always constant; for example, Remove Hex always removes a single hex, whereas the Protection Prayers spell, Divert Hexes removes 1...3...3 hexes, depending on the caster's rank in that attribute.

background.name: No Attribute - Dervish
entries: No Attribute skills are those which are not tied to a particular attribute. Effects of these unlinked skills are almost always constant; for example, Remove Hex always removes a single hex, whereas the Protection Prayers spell, Divert Hexes removes 1...3...3 hexes, depending on the caster's rank in that attribute.

background.name: Paragon
entries: Paragons are the guardian angels of Elona, humanity’s champions against malefic threats. They rally the valiant with Shouts and Chants, aiding heroes, henchmen, and other adventurers through inspiration and motivation. A Paragon’s best weapons rely on an insightful mind, a courageous spirit, and a charismatic voice. Many Paragons also arm themselves with a spear and shield, striking from a distance as they shout their battle cries. Through insight, they help others resist Hexes and Conditions, echoing their commands across the field of battle (in fact, some “Echo” abilities renew themselves each time a Chant or Shout ends). When all hell breaks loose, a commanding Paragon shines as a beacon of light, driving back the forces of darkness.

background.name: Realm of Torment
entries: The Realm of Torment, also called the Nightmare Realm, lies in the Mists and is connected to the Underworld via the Bone Pits. It has become a place where individuals of twisted evil or corruption are banished to spend eternity in torment (hence the name). The various areas that make up the Realm of Torment are filled with aspects of the darker side of reality. The realm has been cut off from mortal access until Nightfall.

The Realm of Torment is where the fallen god Abaddon was imprisoned by the Five Gods of Tyria to avoid spreading his influence across the world. Imprisoned with him are his worshipers including the Margonites, former humans turned into demons by Abaddon, and demons of torment. As punishment for their evil deeds and corruption by Abaddon, the Lich Lord and Shiro Tagachi were also sent here.

Though originally meant as a prison for Abaddon and other corrupted souls, the Realm has become overrun by the god's influence. Though he remains trapped at its heart, his minions have overwhelmed the Forgotten wardens. As his madness and touch became more potent, souls of the innocent were also sent to this realm to prevent his power from spreading throughout the Mists. As Abaddon works towards Nightfall, the Realm of Torment and the world of the living draw ever closer until parts of the two begin to intermingle as the fabric of reality weakens.

background.name: Scythe Mastery
entries: Scythe Mastery increases the damage you do with scythes and your chance to inflict a critical hit when using a scythe. Many skills, especially scythe attack skills, become more effective with higher Scythe Mastery.

background.name: Spear Mastery
entries: Spear Mastery increases the damage you do with spears and your chance to inflict a critical hit when using a spear. Many skills, especially spear attack skills, become more effective with higher Spear Mastery.

background.name: Sunspear Rank
entries: Sunspear rank is gained per character by earning Sunspear promotion points. This title can be displayed in the "Honor" monument.

background.name: Vabbi
entries: The northern province of Vabbi is known for its great wealth and refined culture. Merchant princes pride themselves on their large estates, prosperous businesses, and patronage of the arts. Its provincial government, the Grand Forum of Vabb, is a plutocracy: only the wealthiest princes in the land have the power to make laws. Their legislature is openly democratic, but secretly, a merchant with influence has more power than a councilor with one vote.

Vabbian princes rule the land. Most plutocrats sponsor great festivals and celebrations to display their importance and influence. Celebrations in Vabbian estates are wonders to behold: Dancers flourish in their elegant fashions, gourmands sample cuisine, revelers consume epic quantities of alcohol, and cultured citizens enjoy great works of drama and poetry. Heroes are welcomed at these festivals, where their heroism is celebrated in songs and stories.

The Vabbi are effusive in displays of self-importance, but also keenly aware of how much they depend on other Elonians. The guards of Vabbian estates watch the mountain range to the north, while citizens on the province's southern border depend on neighboring Kournans to keep them safe. Outside the walls of the grand estates, danger is everywhere. Raiders know secret passes through the mountains and mines, and monstrous creatures roam the landscape. Fortunately, every generation of Vabbi includes idealists who dream of adventurous journeys across Elona. New tales of adventure appear on the shelves of Vabbi's libraries each year, as actors portray new heroes on the stages of Vabbian theaters.

background.name: Wind Prayers
entries: No inherent effect. Many Dervish Spells, especially those dealing with movement or cold damage, become more effective with higher Wind Prayers.
